text: Raye Jean Montague (née Jordan; January 21, 1935 – October 10, 2018) was an American naval engineer. She was known for creating the first computer- generated rough draft of a U.S. naval ship. She was the first female program manager of ships in the United States Navy. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Military people from Arkansas Category:American engineers Category:Scientists from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Marine engineers
title: Raye Montague
